SEARCH
Package nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.renderer

Enum Class AudioP

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<AudioP>
nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.renderer.AudioP
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<AudioP>, Constable
public enum AudioP extends Enum<AudioP>
This class is responsible for loading audio files into memory. It ensures all audio files corresponding to enum names and are loaded on start-up. If the audio file is missing, the program will fail. Can only use Wav files unfortunately with a very specific formatting. Here's an example usage: Audio.Thud.play(); This will work anywhere
Author:
Marwan Mohamed
